_header: If ye liven after the fleshes rede
Subjects: scripture, Engl. trans. of; translations; sin
_description: The fruits of carnal sin — one couplet translating ‘Si secundum carnem vixeritis moriemini’ (Rom. 8.13) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝef ȝe liuen after þe flesses redHe sal ȝou
                    bringgen to det withouten dred
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 12.
